home.aboutInfo: At TATTAK ART GALLERY, we believe art is more than just a visual experience—it's a gateway to emotion, thought, and connection. Our curated selection brings together unique and diverse works from emerging and established artists across various mediums. Whether you're an avid collector or discovering art for the first time, we aim to inspire and ignite creativity with every piece. Located in the heart of Tbilisi, our gallery is a space where art, culture, and community come together.
home.storyInfo: TATTAK ART GALLERY was born from the vision and passion of Tata Kacharava, an avid art enthusiast with a lifelong love for creativity. Growing up surrounded by art, Tata found inspiration in the power of visual expression and its ability to tell stories and evoke emotions. After years of traveling, collecting unique pieces, and connecting with artists from all walks of life, the dream of opening a gallery became a reality. In 2022, Tata transformed an old, historic building in the heart of Tbilisi into TATTAK ART GALLERY. This space was created with the intention of providing a platform for both emerging and established artists, offering them a place to showcase their work and connect with a broader audience. The gallery is driven by a desire to create an inclusive environment where art is accessible to everyone, whether you're a seasoned collector or someone just beginning to explore the world of art. Today, TATTAK ART GALLERY stands as a testament to passion for art, creativity, and community. It continues to be a place where artists and art lovers alike can come together to celebrate the beauty and diversity of artistic expression.
home.deliveryInfo: We deliver within Georgia and worldwide. Please note, for orders outside of Georgia you may be required to pay international customs’ duties and local sales tax on receipt of your order. TATTAK ART GALLERY delivery partners are at your disposal. Whether it’s a courier or one of our dedicated delivery drivers, we deliver, handpicked artwork direct to your door.

Artworks.consultationInfo: We can discuss your needs in detail and analyse them together. Our program, designed for art house enthusiasts, interior designers, hotels, and architectural firms, offers tailored outlines that meet your specific requirements.
